member.name: M:TurnInProcessAutomation.BLL.TUEcommSetupCreate.GetAvailableSampleRequests(System.Int32,System.Decimal,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve sample request information from the TTU450Sample_Req table using optional parameters

member.name: M:TurnInProcessAutomation.BLL.TUEcommSetupCreate.UpdateSampleAvailableAndActiveOnWebStatus(System.Collections.Generic.IList{TurnInProcessAutomation.BusinessEntities.EcommSetupCreateInfo}@)
member.summary: Sets the "Available For Turn-in" and "Active on Web" value for each sample in the eCommSamples collection
member.remarks: **Available for Turn-in** Available for Turn in should be "Y" if it meets the following conditions Sample Approval Flag equals to "Y" and Sample status description is not empty and sample status description not in "REQUESTED", "DISPOSED" and "RETURNED". Available for Turn in should be "N" in all other cases **Active on Web** Active on Web should be "Y" if it meets the following conditions Active UPC Flag equals to "Y" and active flag is not empty and active flag equals to "A" and color code not equals to zero. Active on Web should be "N" in all other cases

member.name: M:TurnInProcessAutomation.BLL.TUEcommSetupCreate.ApplyTurnInFilters(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{TurnInProcessAutomation.BusinessEntities.EcommSetupCreateInfo},TurnInProcessAutomation.BLL.TUFilter)
member.summary: Applies the Turn In Filters in the ecommReulsts collection and returns the records which satisfy the search filters
member.param: Turn in filters selected by user
member.returns: eComm results which satisfy the search filters
